grove package¶

Submodules¶

grove.config module¶

grove.config.load_config(config_file_name=None)¶

Loads the JSON configuration file into the configuration dictionary. :param config_file_name: The JSON configuration file name.

grove.config.pretty_config()¶

Pretty-print the configuration. :return: The pretty-printed string version of the configuration.

grove.logger module¶

grove.logger.init_logger(log_path=None)¶

Initializes the logger for various grove components. :param log_path: The directory that Grove will produce log files. If not specified logs will be saved to the
